name: strong
category_path: 33 Gloves SL Elite Short Cuff Youth Batting Gloves: YTS13-1002
features: FIT: SL Elite Short Cuff Gloves offer a secure, tailored fit for hitters, for comfort & freedom of movement
LEATHER: Soft 0.9mm genuine Cabretta leather with a non-slip finish for superior comfort & protection
PALM: Pre-curved, single-layer palm & reverse-stitched fingers enhance bat feel & reduce bulk
TOP HAND: Durable, lightweight, breathable 4-way stretch ensures a secure fit & maximum motion range
FRICTION ZONES: Reinforced glove-to-glove friction zones increase comfort & glove longevity
CUFF: Wide neoprene & leather cuff offers wrist support & a secure fit for better swing performance
CLOSURE: Adjustable cuff with heavy-duty stretch wrap & anti-snag Velcro for customizable fit & support
FOURCHETTES: Breathable, stretchy fourchettes for superior fit & comfort
FINGER SHAPE: Tapered fingers mimic natural hand contours for comfort & reduced seam irritation
THREAD: High-tensile strength nylon thread enhances durability against wear & tear
